categories: Category:Star Wars Adventures: Tales from Vader's Castle

nodes.text: Star Wars Adventures: Tales from Vader's Castle
Star Wars Adventures: Tales from Vader's Castle is a comic book miniseries written by Cavan Scott that was published by IDW Publishing. The first issue was released on October 3, 2018.

A sequel series, Star Wars Adventures: Return to Vader's Castle, was written by Scott and published in October 2019. All five issues of Tales from Vader's Castle, along with all five issues from Return to Vader's Castle, were collected in the hardcover graphic novel, Star Wars Adventures: Beware Vader's Castle.
